10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options;
11  
12  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
13  
14  import javax.swing.text.Document;
15  
16  import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
17  import org.netbeans.api.annotations.common.CheckForNull;
18  import org.netbeans.api.project.FileOwnerQuery;
19  import org.netbeans.api.project.Project;
20  import org.netbeans.api.project.ProjectUtils;
21  import org.netbeans.editor.BaseDocument;
22  import org.netbeans.modules.editor.NbEditorUtilities;
23  import org.openide.filesystems.FileObject;
24  import org.openide.loaders.DataObject;
25  import org.openide.util.NbPreferences;
26  
27  /**
28   * Settings utility class.
29   *
30   * @author markiewb
31   * @author bahlef
32   */
33  public class Settings {
34  	/**
35  	 * Property key which defines the enabled formatter.
36  	 *
37  	 * @since 1.13
38  	 */
39  	public static final String ENABLED_FORMATTER = "enabledFormatter";
40  
41  	/**
42  	 * Property value of the default formatter to use (NetBeans internal formatter).
43  	 *
44  	 * @since 1.13
45  	 */
46  	public static final String DEFAULT_FORMATTER = "netbeans-formatter";
47  
48  	/** Property key which defines the active profile of the Eclipse configuration file. */
49  	public static final String ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_ACTIVE_PROFILE = "eclipseFormatterActiveProfile";
50  
51  	/** Property key which defines the location of the Eclipse formatter configuration file. */
52  	public static final String ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_CONFIG_FILE_LOCATION = "eclipseFormatterLocation";
53  
54  	/** Property key which defines whether or not to use the settings of the external formatter in the NetBeans editor. */
55  	public static final String ENABLE_USE_OF_INDENTATION_SETTINGS = "enableIndentationSettings";
56  
57  	/** Property key which defines whether or not to use the {@link #OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE_VALUE} instead of the one inside the external formatter configuration. */
58  	public static final String OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE = "overrideTabSize";
59  
60  	/** Property key which defines the tab size which is used when {@link #OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE} is actived. */
61  	public static final String OVERRIDE_TAB_SIZE_VALUE = "overrideTabSizeValue";
62  
63  	/** Property key which defines whether or not to show notifications after each formatting. */
64  	public static final String SHOW_NOTIFICATIONS = "showNotifications";
65  
66  	/** Property key which defines whether or not to use project specific settings instead of global formatter settings. */
67  	public static final String USE_PROJECT_SETTINGS = "useProjectSettings";
68  
69  	/**
70  	 * Property key which defines whether or not to use Eclipse project specific formatter configuration if available.
71  	 *
72  	 * @since 1.10
73  	 */
74  	public static final String USE_PROJECT_PREFS = "useProjectPref";
75  
76  	/**
77  	 * Constant value of the Eclipse project specific formatter configuration file name.
78  	 *
79  	 * @since 1.10
80  	 */
81  	public static final String PROJECT_PREF_FILE = "org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs";
82  
83  	/**
84  	 * Property key which defines the line feed setting for the Eclipse formatter.
85  	 *
86  	 * @since 1.10
87  	 */
88  	public static final String LINEFEED = "linefeed";
89  
90  	/**
91  	 * Property key which defines the source level setting for the Eclipse formatter.
92  	 *
93  	 * @since 1.10
94  	 */
95  	public static final String SOURCELEVEL = "sourcelevel";
96  
97  	/**
98  	 * Property key which defines which code style should be used for the Google formatter.
99  	 *
100 	 * @since 1.13
101 	 */
102 	public static final String GOOGLE_FORMATTER_CODE_STYLE = "googleFormatterCodeStyle";
103 
104 	/**
105 	 * Private contructor because of static methods only.
106 	 */
107 	private Settings() {
108 	}
109 
110 	/**
111 	 * Returns the active {@link Preferences} object for the given {@link Document}, either the global
112 	 * preferences are returned or if the {@link Project} has a separate configuration it will return
113 	 * the project specific {@link Preferences}.
114 	 *
115 	 * @param document the document to get the {@link Preferences} for
116 	 *
117 	 * @return the active {@link Preferences} object for the given {@link Document}, either the global
118 	 *         preferences are returned or if the {@link Project} has a separate configuration it will return
119 	 *         the project specific {@link Preferences}
120 	 */
121 	public static Preferences getActivePreferences(Document document) {
122 		Preferences globalPreferences = NbPreferences.forModule(ExternalFormatterPanel.class);
123 		if (document != null) {
124 			DataObject dataObj = NbEditorUtilities.getDataObject(document);
125 			if (dataObj != null) {
126 				FileObject primaryFile = dataObj.getPrimaryFile();
127 				if (primaryFile != null) {
128 					Project project = FileOwnerQuery.getOwner(primaryFile);
129 					if (null != project) {
130 						Preferences projectPreferences = ProjectUtils.getPreferences(project, ExternalFormatterPanel.class, true);
131 						if (projectPreferences.getBoolean(USE_PROJECT_SETTINGS, false)) {
132 							return projectPreferences;
133 						}
134 					}
135 				}
136 			}
137 		}
138 
139 		return globalPreferences;
140 	}
141 
142 	/**
143 	 * Returns the Eclipse formatter file for the given {@link Document} from the given {@link Preferences}.
144 	 * If {@link #USE_PROJECT_PREFS} is {@code true} in the given {@link Preferences}, it will be automatically
145 	 * checked if there is a project specific formatter configuration file available.
146 	 *
147 	 * @param preferences the {@link Preferences} where to load from
148 	 * @param document    the {@link Document}
149 	 *
150 	 * @return the Eclipse formatter file for the given {@link Document} from the given {@link Preferences}.
151 	 *         If {@link #USE_PROJECT_PREFS} is {@code true} in the given {@link Preferences}, it will be automatically
152 	 *         checked if there is a project specific formatter configuration file available
153 	 */
154 	public static String getEclipseFormatterFile(Preferences preferences, Document document) {
155 		String formatterFilePref = null;
156 		if (preferences.getBoolean(Settings.USE_PROJECT_PREFS, true)) {
157 			//use ${projectdir}/.settings/org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs, if activated in options
158 			formatterFilePref = getFormatterFileFromProjectConfiguration(document);
159 		}
160 
161 		if (StringUtils.isBlank(formatterFilePref)) {
162 			formatterFilePref = preferences.get(Settings.ECLIPSE_FORMATTER_CONFIG_FILE_LOCATION, null);
163 		}
164 
165 		return formatterFilePref;
166 	}
167 
168 	/**
169 	 * Checks for a project specific Eclipse formatter configuration for the given {@link Document} and returns
170 	 * the file location if found, otherwise {@code null}.
171 	 *
172 	 * @param document the {@link Document}
173 	 *
174 	 * @return project specific Eclipse formatter configuration for the given {@link Document} if existent,
175 	 *         otherwise {@code null}
176 	 */
177 	@CheckForNull
178 	private static String getFormatterFileFromProjectConfiguration(Document document) {
179 		FileObject fileForDocument = NbEditorUtilities.getFileObject(document);
180 		if (null != fileForDocument) {
181 
182 			Project project = FileOwnerQuery.getOwner(fileForDocument);
183 			if (null != project) {
184 				FileObject projectDirectory = project.getProjectDirectory();
185 				FileObject preferenceFile = projectDirectory.getFileObject(".settings/" + Settings.PROJECT_PREF_FILE);
186 				if (null != preferenceFile) {
187 					return preferenceFile.getPath();
188 				}
189 			}
190 		}
191 
192 		return null;
193 	}
194 
195 	/**
196 	 * Returns {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the workspace mechanic file extension epf.
197 	 *
198 	 * @param filename the filename to check
199 	 *
200 	 * @return {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the workspace mechanic file extension epf,
201 	 *         otherwise {@code false}
202 	 */
203 	public static boolean isWorkspaceMechanicFile(String filename) {
204 		return filename != null && filename.endsWith("epf");
205 	}
206 
207 	/**
208 	 * Returns {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the XML file extension.
209 	 *
210 	 * @param filename the filename to check
211 	 *
212 	 * @return {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with the XML file extension, otherwise
213 	 *         {@code false}
214 	 */
215 	public static boolean isXMLConfigurationFile(String filename) {
216 		return filename != null && filename.endsWith("xml");
217 	}
218 
219 	/**
220 	 * Returns {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with {@code org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs}.
221 	 *
222 	 * @param filename the filename to check
223 	 *
224 	 * @return {@code true} if the given {@code filename} ends with {@code org.eclipse.jdt.core.prefs},
225 	 *         otherwise {@code false}
226 	 */
227 	public static boolean isProjectSetting(String filename) {
228 		return filename != null && filename.endsWith(PROJECT_PREF_FILE);
229 	}
230 
231 	/**
232 	 * Returns the real line feed characters for the given escaped line feed characters.
233 	 *
234 	 * @param lineFeedSetting escaped line feed characters, e.g. {@code \\n}
235 	 * @param fallback        if the escaped line feed characters could not be matched to a real line feed setting
236 	 *
237 	 * @return the real line feed characters for the given escaped line feed characters, or the given
238 	 *         {@code fallback} if the escaped characters could not be matched to a real line feed setting
239 	 */
240 	public static String getLineFeed(String lineFeedSetting, String fallback) {
241 		String linefeed = fallback;
242 
243 		boolean usePlatformLinefeed = StringUtils.isBlank(lineFeedSetting);
244 		if (!usePlatformLinefeed) {
245 			switch (lineFeedSetting) {
246 				case "\\n":
247 					linefeed = BaseDocument.LS_LF;
248 					break;
249 				case "\\r":
250 					linefeed = BaseDocument.LS_CR;
251 					break;
252 				case "\\r\\n":
253 					linefeed = BaseDocument.LS_CRLF;
254 					break;
255 				default:
256 					linefeed = null;
257 					break;
258 			}
259 		}
260 
261 		return linefeed;
262 	}
263 }
